name: semolina harcha
ingredients: A few tbsp of medium semolina (for shaping)
steps: In a large bowl, mix the fine semolina and baking powder with the melted butter to 'sand' the semolina.
Add the salt, sugar, and oil. Pour in the milk to obtain a soft dough.
Preheat a cast iron or non-stick pan without any oil.
Sprinkle a little medium semolina on the hot pan.
Place the dough on the pan using wet hands and spread it quickly (max 1 cm thick). Sprinkle the top with medium semolina.
Cook for 8 to 10 minutes on each side, until golden brown. Serve hot.
